channel.title: Need help fixing run.bat ASAP PAYING!
channel.description: I will pay 5m Rsgp if someone could help me out please. Just team viewer me as i have tried different jre's and jdk's but it just won't work... post if you can asap?

item.title: Need help fixing run.bat ASAP PAYING!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

zadehogan:

ITS NOT AS STRAIGHT FORWARD AS THAT YOU’LL HAVE TO ACTUALLY SEE ON MY SCREEN BECAUSE THE CLASSPATHS AND PATH’s are set up and everything else is linked correctly, it still says this path could not be specified… or some shit.

Then post all relevant information? You can easily screen cap (or copy/paste) your classpaths and such.
It’s really help if you posted the following:
A picture of the error.
The code for your batch file (the one not working. Right click it, hit edit, copy, paste on here).
The location of your most up-to-date JDK.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing run.bat ASAP PAYING!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

zadehogan:

I personally don’t think their is anything wrong as if i wasn’t going to offer the reward i wouldn’t state it.

It’s the forum rules, you have to follow them regardless.
It’s also free help. And as I said, rewards and such can be discussed in pm or somewhere not the forums. We just don’t want the responsibility of taking care of users whom have been scammed. (Or at least, that’s what I see it as).

Post your error. We can’t help much further until you do so.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing run.bat ASAP PAYING!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:7, topic:541506”]When I read the terms “sell” and “selling” I interpret that as the exchange of goods or services for some amount of money, in a real life currency. Virtual currency may or may not come under this definition, but the rule as written doesn’t allude to this. Additionally, after reading the rule as written it seems to be aimed at specifically preventing the sale of items in exchange for real money.

But thanks for the refresher, you should be a moderator or something.[/quote]
Haha noo, then I’d have to come on these forums and do stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing run.bat ASAP PAYING!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

When I read the terms “sell” and “selling” I interpret that as the exchange of goods or services for some amount of money, in a real life currency. Virtual currency may or may not come under this definition, but the rule as written doesn’t allude to this. Additionally, after reading the rule as written it seems to be aimed at specifically preventing the sale of items in exchange for real money.

But thanks for the refresher, you should be a moderator or something.

item.title: Need help fixing run.bat ASAP PAYING!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:4, topic:541506”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=660376.msg4415627#msg4415627 date=1395780890]
pretty sure he can offer a reward if he wants to? nobody has to help him lol
[/quote]

True, I always thought it was against the rules :|[/quote]
That would be because it is…
We do not allow any form of payment for services/etc on these forums (you can arrange that outside of these forums and through PM. There is no section to “report a scammer”, so everything would be at your own risk. Moparscape nor the users are anyway responsible for you being scammed, and no one here will do a damn thing about it).

If anyone needs a refresher:

Rule 8: We do not sell anything on this site, period. This includes offering 'rewards' for donations or anything like that. Selling via signature is not an exception. Furthermore, all requests of price or value for any property related to the game RuneScape is disallowed on these boards. This rule exists to prevent scamming, dishonest trading, and legal liability regarding the exchange of Jagex property. We do not encourage people to buy or sell anything related to RuneScape, Jagex, or any of their games.

Read full topic
